Literature.Title: Designed symmetrical β-hairpin peptides for treating multidrug-resistant salmonella typhimurium infections.
Literature.Author: Ma Z, Zhang D, Cheng Z, Niu Y, Kong L, Lu Z, Bie X

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>128µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>128µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Paratyphi A CICC 21501(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Paratyphi B CICC 21495(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Paratyphi C CICC 21512(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis ATCC 13312(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis CICC 21527(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Wandsworth CICC 21504(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium CICC 21483(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Blockley CICC 21489(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Dublin CICC 21497(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 700408(MIC=>128µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=>128µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(30-40% Cytotoxicity=128µg/ml)
